Text.Value: Where would I find this forge?
Xargrim... Dhourn...
Born... from hellish heat... in hellish heat... destroyed...
Your notes mention a 'Guardian' - what is it?
Who is this Dhourn?
Leave.
How did you come to be here?
The glowing tree - what is it?
Chasing... mystery... riddle... lie... the Adamantine Forge...
What others?
It... stills the Weave... protects me from... the others...
Yes... so beautiful...
You are in my power. I do not ask, I command.
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
If you wish to see your beloved in the afterlife, I can smooth the way.
Three seek... Adamantine Forge... only one of us... may find...
Protector... of the Adamantine Forge...
Workshop... of great Silouv... Yali...
What's the 'Guardian'?
Artefacts... beyond price...
You killed... my beloved... away...
You lived among those creatures?
Location... was Dhourn's task... I learned... of the Guardian...
Filro... forgotten... forsaken...
ANSWER ME!
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Friend... enemy... like Xargrim...
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Who are you?
Nothing more precious than tearing the bonds of true love.
My pack... found me... fed me... gnome flesh...
The Adamantine Forge - what is that?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
You're confused. I would never harm something as beautiful as your beloved.
Yes... please.
Who is this Dhourn your records mention?

Synopsis: Filro is one of three drow rivalry wizards in the Underdark who was looking for the Adamantine Forge, but his long research, loneliness and effects of the Sussur Tree  turned him mad. He lives with the hook horrors pack now.
